# CiBuildAction.Attributes

**Object**

The attributes that describe a Build Actions resource.

## Declaration

```swift
object CiBuildAction.Attributes
```

## Types

- **CiActionType**: A string that represents the type of an Xcode Cloud workflow’s action.

## Objects

- **CiBuildAction.Relationships**: The relationships of the Build Actions resource you included in the request and those on which you can operate.

items.description: A string that represents the type of an Xcode Cloud workflow’s action.
